name: Stygian Crossing
description:
Welcome to the Stygian Crossing! "A paddleboat endlessly travels the River Styx... but it is being weighed down by something, or rather, someone, who should no longer be in the voyage... Charon, the boat's ferryman, is commanded to get up and deal with the two people who have overstayed their welcome. But he must first find out who they are..."

Stygian Crossing is a 2D Visual Novel that takes you on a unique journey on the River Styx, where you, as Charon the ferryman, has to talk to the ill-fated passengers and find out the reason for disturbance on the boat!

Controls:

Walk: Left Mouse Button / A or D 

Converse: Left Mouse Button

Team:
